Brilliance, Made Clear

EXPERIENCE 4K PRECISION
IMAGING WITH

ALSIGHT4K 3

SURGICAL CAMERA

NEVER LOSE SIGHT in Surgical Imaging

Introducing Alsight4K 3, a system built to honour the brilliance that surgeons bring into every procedure. By revealing every detail and protecting every moment of clarity, it makes that brilliance unmistakably clear.

KEY FEATURES

7-INCH LCD TOUCH SCREEN INTERFACE: Intuitive, smooth, and user-friendly operation
01
TRUE-TO-LIFE 4K CLARITY: 3-Chip BSI-CMOS sensor delivers crystal-clear surgical visuals at 3840×2160 resolution
02
INTEGRATED STORAGE SYSTEM: 200GB storage with Patient Information Management capabilities
03
ADVANCED IMAGING SUITE: HyperRange, AdaptView, & OptiFog ensure clarity even in smoke or glare
04
CUSTOMISABLE SURGICAL MODES: 18 total modes with 6-level adjustments for personalised surgical preferences
05
DUAL CAMERA HEAD OPTIONS: Choose Manual Focus or Auto Focus with IPX8 water resistance rating
06
DIGITAL ZOOM & PIP: 2X zoom with 4-layout Picture-in-Picture functionality
07
MANUAL FOCUS CAMERA HEAD: Integrated Zoom Coupler for seamless adjustment
08
ROBUST CONNECTIVITY: Dual HDMI 2.0b, dual 3G-SDI, and 5 USB ports for seamless integration
09

STANDARD ACCESSORIES SET

Camera Head

4K3-MFZ (Manual Focus Camera Head):
3 buttons with 6 customisable functions

Camera Head

4K3-AF (Auto Focus Camera Head):
4 buttons with 6 customisable functions,
1 button fixed for Auto Focus

Alsight4K
Laparoscopes

Top quality optics in Alsight4K laparoscopes offer high image quality, contrast and light transfer ensuring unparalleled vision and clarity for optimal surgical outcomes.
